leads.lead_text: Leaves leathery; flowers white; involucral bracts not markedly larger than leaves; floral tube circumscissile above ovary in fruit
Leaves more or less membranous; flowers yellow; involucral bracts markedly larger than subtending leaves; floral tube persisting in fruit
